name: Swiit Crush - Flirt & Match
description:
Are you ready to find love?

It’s time to take your relationships to the next level. Meet your crush and match – just one swipe away! The question is, will you be nice and sweet or sassy and nasty? You decide. It’s all up to you! But we can tell you that the experience will be fun and sexy ;) Why? Because you make your own choices! But it’s always better to take your time and see who’s right for you. Will you find your perfect match/crush/love?

What is Swiit Crush?


Swiit Crush is a virtual dating romance app that lets you match with your crush and chat with your choices! You will meet interesting, sexy, funny, flirty, exciting and amazing characters to swipe and match with and you will be able to learn more about them and go on a date with them. It’s time to dive into an all-new narrative dating experience and win over your love. It’s easy and fun to find love on Swiit Crush. Are you ready to mingle and have fun or commit to a relationship?

You can get to know your potential crush! Unlock new pictures from them. All your crushes have a backstory to discover, they have their own life and experience that create their unique story. It will be tons of fun no matter what! Why?

Because you decide the direction, you make the choices that influence your romance and the conclusion of your love story. So match, date, flirt, and maybe more…

Download Swiit Crush, a story and romance app that will let you meet amazing and fun characters that are just waiting for you!

We want to give you the best virtual dating experience possible with different personalities and characters you can meet along the way.


With Swiit Crush, discover:

Beautiful love interests and crushes! You only need to swipe and chat!
Different relationships: you can date men and women! You can have heterosexual, gay or bisexual relationships. It’s all about chemistry!
- Your next love stories! It’s time to DATE and CONNECT.
- Sensual and sexy conversation/CHAT/SMS and STORIES!
Amazing pictures to see and UNLOCK!
More than 100 cute and sexy characters to meet, to date, to love… get to know them and just make your choices ;)
New stories every week.
Event stories and chapters!

Who will be your crush?

You choose your love in Swiit Crush, the brand-new dating fantasy for the people that love interactive story apps!

If you love life simulation, dating, choices, episodes and chapters games, this is the app for you!

It’s time to match and catch feelings for as many characters as you want.

It’s your choice: find out what you’ve got in common with your potential match. (Maybe you like TV and chess? Great combo!)

FUN ROMANCE or SERIOUS RELATIONSHIP? Choose your destiny and decide what will be your exciting story today!

Why you’ll love playing Swiit Crush:

Choose how your love story concludes and create your love episodes your way!

There are so many amazing characters to meet. Will you win their love?

You decide how the chapters in your love story continue…

Just swipe left and right and start a new relationship with other characters then match, date and find romance...

Download Swiit Crush to start your new chapter in your love story!
